summary: The U.S. relies on internet-connected devices for essentials like power and water as well as everyday items like smart speakers. Federal agencies covered by a 2020 law were told to inventory their internet-connected devices by the end of FY 2024 and document how their cybersecurity aligns with federal standards. As of July 2024, 9 agencies said they wouldn't make the inventory deadline. Agencies can get...
title: Internet of Things: Federal Actions Needed to Address Legislative Requirements
